attributes.action: Weight the Taxation and Benefits System  that actively supports two parent families and Carers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In Britain we have a growing culture of "The less we declare the more we benefit". I would like to change this social model to have a fairer tax and benefit system to actively encourage two parent families and those that Care for others.
This model will enable less dependancy on the state.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/full-timeparents/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
